ARTICLE.TITLE: Weighing the risks of traveling
ARTICLE.TEXT: With that mindset, consider the health of anyone you may come in contact with during and after your trip — everyone from gas station attendants to your friends and family. You may be putting their health in jeopardy. So be sure to maintain social distancing and wear masks when appropriate. When you return, it’s recommended that you quarantine for at least two weeks. If you’re traveling alone, make sure you have space in your home to quarantine without coming into contact with anyone, or secure lodging elsewhere before you travel.
